name.column_description: The name of the ERC20 token

address.column_description: The address of the ERC20 token

decimals.column_description: The number of decimals the token uses. Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block where this token was created

block_number.column_description: Block number where this token was created

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block where this token was created

symbol.column_description: The symbol of the ERC20 token

total_supply.column_description: The total token supply. Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64

log_index.column_description: Log index in the transaction receipt

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block where this transfer was in

block_number.column_description: Block number where this transfer was in

value.column_description: Amount of tokens transferred (ERC20) / id of the token transferred (ERC721). Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block where this transfer was in
